description:
Get ready for an exciting yarn starring Ekoda, brought to you by director Misawa Shin (Gingitsune, Kodomo no Jikan) and Doi Mika (Super Dimensional Fortress Macross, Rurouni Kenshin).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Misawa Shin x Doi Mika
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 7 - Misawa Shin x Doi Mika
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 三沢伸 x 土井美加
